trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around November 30th 2000
divs: Sighting DetailsMy daughter and I were driving from Tulsa to Oklahoma City. We were near TinkerAir Force Base. some time in the mid mnorningIm really not sure of the time butI know it was during day light. We saw some planes chasing another thing thatkinda looked like a plane. The only difference was that it see4med to beshooting lights like sparklers out the rear of the UFO. We thought at firstthat what ever it was was going to crash but suddenly to shot up in the sky onabout a 45 degree angel. The other planes tried to follow up but it moved veryvery quickly.Up into the air...Honestly I dont know what we saw but it wassomething very strange....I have never before seen anything like this..I spent 5years in the Air Force and I have never seen a plane do that and I have neverseen a plane move so fast...Im not a quack Im a RN and my daughter is in themilitary and repares planes and helacopters
